channel.title: [PI] Players can run through walls? [PI]
channel.description:
Hello, I have a PI source that I'm messing around with and I'm wondering if anybody can help me solve this problem. The source is pretty much done except that when a player attacks a monster or player, it will allow the player to run through anything in his/her way until they finally attack the monster or player. Is there a way to make it so they still have to run around obstacles in their way to attack?
Any help is appreciated.

item.title: [PI] Players can run through walls? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Demo1 Demo_
item.description:
@Demo1 wrote:

DrummerDavex:

Not asking for a spoonfeed, but are there any tutorials you could recommend to help me out a little bit?

Tutorials section>search bar

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Players can run through walls? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

You need to have proper clipping

There’s lots of tutorials on it, search for it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Players can run through walls? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

clip that certain region/tile, but not every single tile because it will be one massive loop, and it will take ages to read it.

Read full topic
